pkgmetadata.longdescription: Empirical Likelihood for General Block Designs // Performs hypothesis testing for general block designs with empirical likelihood. The core computational routines are implemented using the 'Eigen' 'C++' library and 'RcppEigen' interface, with 'OpenMP' for parallel computation. Details of the methods are given in Kim, MacEachern, and Peruggia (2023) doi:10.1080/10485252.2023.2206919. This work was supported by the U.S. National Science Foundation under Grants No. SES-1921523 and DMS-2015552.
